original_text: The Chaldeans who are fighting against this city shall come and set this city on fire and burn it, with the houses on whose roofs offerings have been made to Baal and drink offerings have been poured out to other gods, to provoke me to anger.
korean_text: 이 성을 치는 갈대아인이 와서 이 성읍에 불을 놓아 성과 집 곧 그 지붕에서 바알에게 분향하며 다른 신들에게 전제를 드려 나를 격노하게 한 집들을 사르리니

sentences.original_text: The Chaldeans who are fighting against this city
and set this city on fire
with the houses on whose roofs offerings have been made to Baal
sentences.korean_translation: 그 지붕 위에서 바알에게 제물을 바친 집들과

sentences.original_text: and drink offerings have been poured out to other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 신들에게 전제를 부은 집들도 함께
